name: Dark Chocolate Fudgy Brownies
keywords: Chocolate, Dessert, Easy, Snack, Sweet, Brownies, Dark Chocolate, Fudgy, Baking, Treat, Party Food, Afternoon Tea, Kid Friendly, Simple, Delicious, Homemade, Chocolate Lovers
description: Rich and easy to make dark chocolate brownies perfect for snacking on.

recipeInstructions.text: Line a 16cm-ish square baking tin with baking paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare Tin

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the melted butter and sugar together in a bowl. Whisk for about a minute until nicely combined. Add the eggs and vanilla. Again beat until lighter in colour, for about a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine Ingredients

recipeInstructions.text: Sift in the flour and cocoa powder, then add in the dark chocolate. Gently fold the ingredients together until just combined. Be careful not to overmix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add Dry Ingredients

recipeInstructions.text: Put the batter in the tin and smooth out to be even.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour Batter

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for about 30-40 minutes, longer for crispier edges and harder insides.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake

recipeInstructions.text: Remove and allow to cool to room temperature before slicing into 10 brownies.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool and Slice

notes: Also great with walnuts mixed in.
For a fudgier brownie, underbake slightly.
Dust with powdered sugar before serving for an extra touch.
